member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_SCOPEVAR_INFO.StructMemberScope
member.summary: Gives a scope to look up struct members. This member will be -1 if D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_SCOPEVAR_INFO does not refer to a struct.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_SCOPEVAR_INFO.uArrayIndices
member.summary: Number of array indices. For example a three dimensional array would have a value of 3 for uArrayIndices.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_SCOPEVAR_INFO.ArrayElements
member.summary: Offset to an array of UINT values uArrayIndices long. The array contains the maximum value for each index. For example an array a[3][2][1] would have the values {3,2,1} at the offset pointed to by ArrayElements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_SCOPEVAR_INFO.ArrayStrides
member.summary: Offset to an array of UINT values uArrayIndices long. The array contains the stride for each array index. For example an array a[3][2][1] would have the values {2,1,1} at the offset pointed to by ArrayStrides.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_SCOPEVAR_INFO.uFirstVariable
member.summary: Index of the first variable, later variables are offsets from this one.
